message_list.content: Hola, bienvenido a Celestar Air. Soy Nova, tu asistente virtual de vuelos. Gracias por llamar. ¿En qué puedo ayudarte hoy?
Hi there! I need some help changing my booking, please.
Great, I can help with that. Could you share your reservation code (PNR) and your last name so I can locate your booking?
Sure! My reservation code is WZZ82H, and my last name is Smith.
Thanks, I’ve pulled up your booking for Smith under PNR WZZ82H. Would you like me to continue to search for new flight options to change your itinerary?
Yes, please! I need to move the date to January 7th instead.

Got it. Do you prefer a morning, afternoon, or evening departure on January 7th? Also, are you flexible by a day if it’s cheaper or earlier?

This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I’ll search January 7th with your preference once you share it.
Oh, I’d prefer a midday flight if possible, but I’m not really flexible with the date—January 7th works best for me.

Thanks. I’ll look for midday departures on January 7th. This may take a moment; thanks for your patience.

Here are the top options I found:
1) 12:05 PM — Nonstop — Economy — estimated fare difference: $48
2) 1:20 PM — 1 stop (short connection) — Economy — estimated fare difference: $0
3) 11:40 AM — Nonstop — Premium Economy — estimated fare difference: $129

Which option would you like to choose?
I think I’ll go with the first option, the 12:05 PM nonstop flight.

Great choice. I’ll proceed with the 12:05 PM nonstop option for January 7th.

Before I finalize the change, I’ll update your contact details. Please provide your email address, country calling code, and phone number.
My email is mia.smith@example.com, and my phone number is +1 0601084698.

Perfect, I’ve updated your email to mia.smith@example.com and your phone number to +1 0601084698. I’ll go ahead and process the change to the 12:05 PM nonstop flight on January 7th.

This may take a moment; thanks for your patience.
Okay, no problem, take your time!

All set—your itinerary has been changed to the January 7th nonstop departing at 12:05 PM. There’s an estimated fare difference of $48, and no additional payment is required today. You’ll receive an updated confirmation at mia.smith@example.com.

Is there anything else I can help you with?
Nope, that's all for now! Thanks so much for your help!
You’re very welcome! Thanks for choosing Celestar Air—have a great trip on January 7th. If anything else comes up, I’m here to help. Goodbye!
